scripts.build-dev-cordova: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=development node ./build/build.js && cd cordova && cordova build
scripts.build-prod-cordova: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=production node ./build/build.js && cd cordova && cordova build
scripts.build-dev-cordova-ios: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=development node ./build/build.js && cd cordova && cordova build ios
scripts.build-prod-cordova-ios: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=production node ./build/build.js && cd cordova && cordova build ios
scripts.build-dev-cordova-android: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=development node ./build/build.js && cd cordova && cordova build android
scripts.build-prod-android: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=production node ./build/build.js && cd cordova && cordova build --release android && cp /Users/misterling/Desktop/cordova_ling/cordova/platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release-unsigned.apk /Users/misterling/Desktop/cordova_ling && cd /Users/misterling/Desktop/cordova_ling && jarsigner -verbose -sigalg SHA1withRSA -digestalg SHA1 -keystore linglilove-release.keystore app-release-unsigned.apk linglilove
scripts.signed: mv /Users/misterling/Desktop/cordova_ling/cordova/platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release-unsigned.apk /Users/misterling/Desktop/cordova_ling && cd /Users/misterling/Desktop/cordova_ling && jarsigner -verbose -sigalg SHA1withRSA -digestalg SHA1 -keystore linglilove-release.keystore.old app-release-unsigned.apk linglilove
scripts.build-upload: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=production node ./build/build.js && cp -rf ./cordova/www cordova/platforms/android/app/src/main/assets/www && cd cordova && code-push release-cordova linglilove_android android -d Production --des 555
scripts.upload-only: cd cordova && code-push release-cordova linglilove_android android -d Production --des 123
scripts.browser: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=development node ./build/build.js && cd cordova && cordova build browser && cordova run browser
scripts.ios: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=production node ./build/build.js && cd cordova && cordova build ios && cordova run ios
